Shimazu Masayoshi <patriot014@...> wrote:
 
>> "Samurai, farmer, artisan, or trader,
>> Oldster, youngster, boy or girl
>> Clever or stupid, poor or elite.
>> You won't get civilized if you don't eat meat!"
>> 
>NOTICE  --- His Illustrious Excellency the Lord Shogun >Tokugawa Yoshinobu wishes it known that the person who wrote >this unspeakably atrocious excuse for a poem will be captured >by the Shinsengumi, very slowly tortured, and then tied to a >very large stone and drowned in the inner moat of Edo Castle.

Captain Sagara would like to remind everyone that he and the Somo Roshitai are always looking for opportunities to set fires and create general mayhem.  Being oppressed?  Figure your literary efforts are at least as good as Shinsengumi Vice Commander Hijikata's?  Trouble with bakufu pests?  Contact Saigou Takamori to make arrangements.  All forms of cash taken (literally).  In an emergency, contact Suzuki Mikisaburou, our Shinsengumi representative, in Kyoto.
